mapper.select: select * from user where us_id = #{us_id} AND us_auth =#{us_auth}
mapper.insert: insert into user (us_id, us_pw, us_auth, us_name, us_gender, us_phone, us_email, us_failed, us_say) values (#{us.us_id}, #{us.us_pw}, #{us.us_auth}, #{us.us_name}, #{us.us_gender}, #{us.us_phone}, #{us.us_email}, 0, #{us.us_say})
mapper.update: update user set us_cookie = #{us.us_cookie}, us_limit = #{us.us_limit} where us_id = #{us.us_id}
mapper.select: select * from user where us_cookie = #{us_cookie} and us_limit > now()
